trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnModeChanged"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il metodo che gestirà il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnModeChanged"> </xref> evento di un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnModeChanged> event is raised when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A> property of a column in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control changes.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnModeChanged>evento viene generato quando il valore della <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A>proprietà di una colonna in un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controllare le modifiche.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnModeChanged>

trans-unit.source: When you create a DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnModeEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando si crea un delegato DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnModeEventHandler, si identifica il metodo che gestirà l'evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Per associare l'evento al gestore eventi, aggiungere un'istanza del delegato all'evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Il gestore eventi viene chiamato ogni volta che si verifica l'evento, a meno che non venga rimosso il delegato.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sui delegati del gestore eventi, vedere [NIB: eventi e delegati](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
